description: To query income statement value and provide the link if the income statement is ready to be downloaded

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Format is YYYYMMdd.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: This token is API access token to identify your permission to use API. Visit link below.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for some APIs.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key. Base on HMAC-SHA256

parameters.name: income_statement_id
parameters.description: The identifier for income statement file request.

children.name: id
children.description: The identifier for income statement file request

children.name: file_link
children.description: Link to download income statement file
